import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function LiveEventsGallery(){const[photos,setPhotos]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{fetch('https://your-api.com/live-events')// Replace with your real API
.then(res=>{if(!res.ok)throw new Error('Failed to fetch photos');return res.json();}).then(data=>setPhotos(data)).catch(err=>setError(err.message)).finally(()=>setLoading(false));},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading live event photos..."});if(error)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Error: ",error]});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("section",{className:"p-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-3xl font-bold mb-4",children:"Live Event Highlights"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-4",children:photos.map(photo=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shadow-md rounded-lg overflow-hidden",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:photo.url,alt:photo.title,className:"w-full h-60 object-cover"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg font-semibold",children:photo.title}),photo.description&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-sm text-gray-600",children:photo.description})]})]},photo.id))})]});}export default LiveEventsGallery;
